title: A letter to the girl I loooove
paragraphs: Lghzala diali,^1000 I just wanted to express to you ^1000 how much you mean to me, ^1000 even though words will never capture everything thatâ€™s in my heart ^1000 but at least it's a way to show you. ^1000

Being with you ^1000 feels like finally being where I belong. ^1000 You make me feel more alive and more myself than I ever thought possible, ^1000 3rfti with you ^1000 I've found peace and excitement all at once. ^1000

Thank you ^1000 for being you ^1000 and for letting me be a part of your world ^1000 o I appreciate every moment we share, ^1000 every memory we create ^1000 o I'm looking forward ^1000 to share more memories together. ^1000

O one think ^1000 is I wanna take this as an opportunity ^1000 to apologize ^1000 o to tell you bli I respect you soo much ^1000 o I'll never ^1000 think of a way ^1000 to put you in a hard position ever. ^1000
Ig ^1000 I just didn't think ^1000 when I did that to you ^1000 I'm so sorry again ^1000 and I swear ^1000 I've never felt more heartbroken ^1000 when I saw you crying because of me. ^1000
Your tears ^1000 are too precious for me to cause them to go out, ^1000 o since you gave me another chance ^1000 I promise ^1000 I'll never let you cry again ^1000 because of me no matter what, ^1000
I hope ^1000 you accept this sincere apology from me <3. ^1000
